TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputQuality extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定列印裝置的輸出品質類型。

span.span: Specifies the types of output quality for a print device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此類型的值，主要是針對這些用途：Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - 為成員集合，其屬性的，這些值會指出的印表機支援的輸出品質類型。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the types of output quality that a printer supports. - 值為屬性，它們會直接以產生特定品質印表機。As the value of the property of a , they direct a printer to produce a particular quality. `Unknown`屬性中不會使用值物件。The `Unknown` value is never used in properties of objects. 您應該永遠不會設定屬性`Unknown`。You should never set a property to `Unknown`. 如果其他產生應用程式已建立*PrintTicket 文件*的輸出品質功能將無法辨識的選項 (也就是未定義中的選項[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，則該文件，建構應用程式中的物件都有`Unknown`做為值屬性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the output quality feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have `Unknown` as the value of the property. 雖然和類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能或類別。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 列印結構描述和建立新的列印系統類別擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## 附註的 OutputQuality.PhotographicNotes on OutputQuality.Photographic 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]，GDI 印表機進行列印時，和 Windows 7 和舊版 Windows 上執行時，取得相片值的輸出品質會改善 （相較於舊版.NET Framework）作業系統。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)], the output quality obtained with the Photographic value is improved (compared to previous versions of the .NET Framework) when printing to a GDI-based printer and when running on Windows 7 and earlier versions of the Windows operating system. 產生更好的輸出品質的文件時，需要較大的列印多工緩衝處理器檔案，以及較長的等待時間。Producing documents with better output quality requires larger print spooler files and longer wait times. 如果這些副作用是讓人困擾，您可以改為使用最高的值。If these side effects are undesirable, you can instead use the High value. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何測試印表機的功能，以及設定列印工作，以充分利用它們。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. 。. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Automatic = int32(1)

summary.span: 自動根據列印工作的內容選取品質類型。

span.span: Automatically selects a quality type that is based on the contents of a print job.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Draft = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Fax = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality High = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Normal = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Photographic = int32(6)

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱＜備註＞一節中的 [OutputQuality.Photographic 注意事項](#Photographic)。

span.span: For more information, see [Notes on OutputQuality.Photographic](#Photographic) in the Remarks section.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Text = int32(7)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.OutputQuality Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 功能 (其選項由這個列舉表示) 設定的選項並未在[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定義。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
